entities.name: SUMER
entities.description: Ancient civilization in Mesopotamia where cuneiform writing was developed around 3000 BCE

entities.name: EGYPT
entities.description: Ancient civilization that developed hieroglyphics, a writing system used for religious and historical texts

entities.name: CHINA
entities.description: Ancient civilization that developed logographic scripts, including Chinese characters

entities.name: MESOPOTAMIA
entities.description: Region where the Sumerians lived and developed cuneiform writing

entities.name: JEAN-FRANÇOIS CHAMPOLLION
entities.description: 19th-century scholar who deciphered Egyptian hieroglyphics

entities.name: GREEKS
entities.description: Ancient civilization that adapted the alphabet and developed the first true alphabet with symbols for consonants and vowels

entities.name: LATIN ALPHABET
entities.description: Writing system derived from the Greek alphabet, used in English and most European languages

entities.name: UNICODE
entities.description: Digital writing system that facilitates the global exchange of written texts in multiple languages and scripts

entities.name: CUNEIFORM
entities.description: Early writing system used by the Sumerians, consisting of wedge-shaped symbols on clay tablets

entities.name: HIEROGLYPHICS
entities.description: Writing system used in ancient Egypt, consisting of intricate symbols representing sounds and ideas

entities.name: CHINESE CHARACTERS
entities.description: Logographic script developed in China, with each character representing words or morphemes

entities.name: ALPHABET
entities.description: Writing system that represents speech sounds, originating in the ancient Near East and adapted by the Greeks

entities.name: DEVELOPMENT OF WRITING SYSTEMS
entities.description: The historical process of creating and evolving writing systems from pictographs to modern alphabets and digital scripts

entities.name: ANCIENT NEAR EAST
entities.description: Region where the alphabet originated and was later adapted by the Greeks

entities.name: COMPUTERS
entities.description: Modern technology that has transformed the way we write and communicate, enabling instant access to vast amounts of information

entities.name: SMARTPHONES
entities.description: Modern devices that have transformed the way we write and communicate, enabling instant access to vast amounts of information

entities.name: INTERNET
entities.description: Global network that has transformed the way we write and communicate, enabling instant access to vast amounts of information

entities.name: EMOJIS
entities.description: Modern form of communication used in digital writing, often used to convey emotions and ideas

entities.name: EMOTICONS
entities.description: Modern form of communication used in digital writing, often used to convey emotions and ideas

entities.name: AUGMENTED REALITY
entities.description: Technology that overlays digital information on the real world, potentially transforming the way we write and communicate

entities.name: VIRTUAL REALITY
entities.description: Technology that creates immersive digital environments, potentially transforming the way we write and communicate

entities.name: MODERN ERA
entities.description: The current period characterized by the use of digital technology and the transformation of writing and communication
